name: Mallory :v_trans: :v_lesbian: (@malcircuit@thingy.social)
summary:
The same sort of pattern can show up with something like being trans or gay. Anything that society stigmatizes, despite it being a thing a person is born with or otherwise has no control over. 

If people are punished for being themselves, they hide themselves.  They break themselves to fit into the mold. 

4/4
